issue.title: [Release][C#] Package upload script is broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12898](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12898). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Download URL is wrong
- Downloaded packages aren't removed

comments.body:
